mapper.select: SELECT R.RECIPE_NUMBER, R.USER_ID, R.RECIPE_NAME, R.RECIPE_DETAIL, R.RECIPE_CATEGORY, R.RECIPE_TIME, R.RECIPE_DATE, COUNT(W.RECIPE_NUMBER) AS RECIPE_COUNT FROM RECIPE_TBL R LEFT JOIN WISH_TBL W ON R.RECIPE_NUMBER = W.RECIPE_NUMBER GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NUMBER, R.USER_ID, R.RECIPE_NAME, R.RECIPE_DETAIL, R.RECIPE_CATEGORY, R.RECIPE_TIME, R.RECIPE_DATE ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, R.RECIPE_NUMBER DESC

SELECT R.RECIPE_NUMBER, R.USER_ID, R.RECIPE_NAME, R.RECIPE_DETAIL, R.RECIPE_CATEGORY, R.RECIPE_TIME, R.RECIPE_DATE, COUNT(W.RECIPE_NUMBER) AS RECIPE_COUNT FROM RECIPE_TBL R LEFT JOIN WISH_TBL W ON R.RECIPE_NUMBER = W.RECIPE_NUMBER GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NUMBER, R.USER_ID, R.RECIPE_NAME, R.RECIPE_DETAIL, R.RECIPE_CATEGORY, R.RECIPE_TIME, R.RECIPE_DATE ORDER BY RECIPE_COUNT DESC
